articles.title: DreamCloud Coupons: Save Up To 60% On Editor-Approved Mattresses
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud offers up to 66% off on mattresses and bedding purchases through verified coupons and deals.

articles.title: 38 Eccentric Products You Probably Weren't Looking For
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents an array of novel products, from Lego botanical 'happy plants' to a Godzilla microwave cleaner. These products offer solutions ranging from stress relief with a NeeDoh 'Dream Drop' to kitchen convenience with a 'Gracula' garlic crusher. The collection caters to various consumer needs and preferences with innovative designs and functionalities.

articles.title: Nio Puts on a Show With ES8, ET9 Launch
articles.author: Moz Farooque ACCA
articles.summary: Nio launched its third-generation ES8 SUV, featuring up to 697 horsepower and fast-charging, with prices starting at RMB 406,800.  The company also debuted the ET9 Horizon Edition sedan.  Nio highlighted its 3,500th battery swap station, showcasing its battery-as-a-service offering.

articles.title: DreamCloud Coupons: Up To 60% Off In September 2025
articles.author: Bianca Alvarez
articles.summary: DreamCloud's Classic Hybrid mattress is recognized as the best value mattress for 2025, while their Premier Hybrid is noted as the best hybrid for couples. The DreamCloud Luxe Hybrid Mattress is also featured as a top pick known for its edge support and motion isolation.

articles.title: YouWare: The World's Leading AI Vibe Coding Community Redefining Development Experiences
articles.author: Evertise
articles.summary: YouWare is introducing AI-powered tools including the AI Website Builder, AI App Generator, and Figma to Website, to simplify website and app development. These tools aim to lower barriers for creators of all skill levels, enabling faster and smarter creation of websites and applications.

articles.title: Palantir pushes lifestyle brand with new merch
articles.author: Esteban L. Hernandez
articles.summary: Palantir launched new merchandise online, aiming to transform itself into a lifestyle brand. This launch occurred a week before a prototype of Palantir's new tracking tool created for ICE is expected.

articles.title: I tried an Android phone with a 22,000mAh battery - it made my iPhone 17 ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Doogee's S200 Max offers extreme durability and performance. The product is not a lightweight device.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Must-Haves To Manage Your Daily Chaos
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: This compilation showcases a wide array of organizational and convenience-focused products for home use. Featured items include flex bins, clothing steamers, laundry carts, pet hair removers, magnetic notepads, robot vacuums, armchair caddies, feeder stations, knife sets, doormats, duffel bags, spray bottle mounts, spice racks, shoe organizers, dusters, wire straps, food storage bins, drawer organizers, thermometers, charging boxes, media holders, toy organizers, toilet cabinets, hall trees, island carts, ottomans, desk organizers, outlet mounts and under-bed storage bins.

articles.title: Wove Jewelry Reinvents the Ring Shopping Experience
articles.summary: Wove, an online jewelry store founded by military veterans, introduces a 'try before you buy' program where customers receive a mockup ring before committing to the final purchase. The company offers a range of jewelry including promise rings, wedding bands and custom bracelets.

articles.title: The Hyundai IONIQ 5 N gets a new Essentials trim in Korea and a lower price tag
articles.author: Peter Johnson
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the IONIQ 5 N Essentials trim in Korea, offering a lower price while maintaining the same driving performance. This new trim aims to make the high-performance EV more accessible. The IONIQ 5 N Essentials trim starts at 74.9 million won ($54,000), including tax benefits.

articles.title: After 10 years of owning a smart TV, I finally installed a VPN—and it changed everything
articles.author: Anwesha Roy
articles.summary: Proton VPN allows users to access location-specific streaming libraries on smart TVs, expanding content options on platforms like Netflix and YouTube. With Proton VPN users can access additional content unavailable in their region at no cost, by connecting to servers in countries like the US, UK, Japan, and South Korea. Though some platforms like Amazon Prime may block VPN usage, the experience of using Proton VPN enhances the accessibility of other streaming content and provides a richer user experience.

articles.title: Gneuton Unveils Sustainable Water Purification for AI Data Centers
articles.author: Gneuton
articles.summary: Gneuton launched a patented thermal distillation technology to purify water using waste heat from gas turbine-powered AI data centers. The technology transforms data centers into carbon-neutral sources of fresh water, addressing the growing water demands of AI. This is intended to improve sustainability.

articles.title: NikeSKIMS Unveils Bold Vision with Inaugural Collection Inspired by the Power and Strength of Women Athletes
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Nike and SKIMS are launching their inaugural apparel collection, NikeSKIMS, on September 26. The collection is designed to sculpt and engineered to perform for female athletes. NikeSKIMS aims to deliver a new aesthetic and system of dress crafted for the body from the studio to the gym.

articles.title: Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis' Looks Good Enough To Be A Full Sequel In Latest Footage
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis showcases impressive visuals in new gameplay footage. This indicates potential updates or promotion for the game.

articles.title: More than 3,000 Amazon shoppers bought this 'powerful' electric scrubber this month — it's usually $400, but it's on sale for $50 right now
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber, an "all-in-one tool" for cleaning, is currently on sale on Amazon Canada. The scrubber features eight detachable brushes, two speed settings, and an extendable handle and has an IPX7 waterproof rating. User reviews suggest it's effective for general cleaning, although some question its power for deep cleaning tasks.

articles.title: Sometimes shoppers don't know what they really want. Here's how SharkNinja deals with that problem
articles.author: Anna-Louise Jackson
articles.summary: SharkNinja designs its FrostVault coolers based on identified consumer pain points. Sunday provides personalized lawn care solutions, informed by customer data and an AI tool named Sunny. These product and service strategies involve data-driven innovation.

articles.title: This TCL phone with a paper-like display can easily replace my Kindle
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: TCL is introducing the Nxtpaper 60 Ultra, a product focused on eye comfort and stylus usability. The device represents a shift in focus, prioritizing these features over raw power.

articles.title: I found a Magic Bullet blender that 20,000 people bought last month on sale for under $45
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: The article promotes the Magic Bullet Blender, emphasizing its 11-piece set, ease of cleaning, and versatility for recipes like salsa.  It also mentions discounted Amazon Prime memberships for young adults.

articles.title: Nota Welcomes Google Veteran Anntao Diaz as Director of Product
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Nota launched Nota News and partnered with Sidearm Sports. Nota is building the adaptive operating system for storytelling and is entering its next phase of growth with more product launches and partnerships on the horizon. The company is also focused on empowering businesses with tools to think, plan, and create content like a world-class media brand, building an AI thought partner for business storytelling.

articles.title: EarthSuds Wins "Most Innovative Product" at CHFA Launch Pad During CHFA NOW Toronto 2025
articles.summary: EarthSuds won the Most Innovative Product award at CHFA Launch Pad for its line of shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hand soap tablets. The company's products aim to reduce plastic waste by offering personal care essentials in a plastic-free, single-use tablet format. EarthSuds plans to use the award support to launch with more retailers and expand availability across Canada.

articles.title: This New Luxury Campervan Blends Boutique Hotel Vibes with All-Wheel Drive Capability
articles.author: Hayley Helms
articles.summary: Noovo is set to launch the Noovo Next, a luxury campervan built on a Mercedes-Benz Sprinter chassis. It features a high-end interior with a queen-sized bed, 4k projector, full-sized bathroom, and off-grid power capabilities. Pre-orders are available now for the Noovo Next, with production scheduled for spring 2026, starting at $232,750.

articles.title: The Powerful 2011 Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG Gullwing in Photos
articles.author: Bryan Hood
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz launched the 2011 SLS AMG Gullwing, a sports car powered by a 6.2-liter V-8 engine. The vehicle features gull-wing doors, a black Designo Exclusive leather interior, and an infotainment system with a rearview camera and navigation. AMG designed and built the SLS AMG Gullwing.

articles.title: The 17 best shampoos for every hair type and budget in 2025
articles.author: Mili Godio
articles.summary: The article presents various shampoo products for different hair types and scalp conditions. It highlights shampoos from brands like Vanicream, Ouai, Odele, Dove, Nioxin, Revitalash, Ouidad, SheaMoisture, and Milk_shake, each addressing specific needs such as dry hair, oily hair, dandruff, and color-treated hair. The recommendations are based on expert opinions and staff favorites, providing a range of options from budget-friendly to luxe picks.

articles.title: Oxi Fresh Carpet Cleaning Expands Service Offerings to Include Dryer Vent Cleaning
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Oxi Fresh Carpet Cleaning has introduced dryer vent cleaning services to expand its service portfolio. This new service aims to promote home safety and efficiency. Franchisees can leverage Oxi Fresh's branding and infrastructure to quickly launch this new service, potentially boosting job value and recurring revenue.

articles.title: Nothing: $200 Million Series C At $1.3 Billion Valuation Raised To Launch AI-Native Consumer Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Nothing plans to launch its first AI-native products in 2026, designed to enhance smartphone capabilities with real-time intelligence and context-aware interactions. These new devices will assist users precisely when they need help. The company has secured significant funding to propel these plans forward.

articles.title: NoPayn Turns Frustration into Innovation with Radical Transparency Approach
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: NoPayn has launched its merchant services platform, built on radical transparency, eliminating setup fees and hidden charges. The platform is designed for high-risk merchants, offering dedicated account managers, free plugin setup, and direct support on a rolling monthly basis. NoPayn also integrates reforestation and climate offset initiatives.

articles.title: TikTok is tagging videos from Gaza with TikTok Shop products
articles.author: Mia Sato
articles.summary: TikTok introduced a new 'Find Similar' feature, a visual search tool using AI to identify objects in videos and suggest similar products on TikTok Shop. This feature aims to capitalize on user-generated content by linking it directly to commerce, allowing users to find and purchase similar items showcased in videos.

articles.title: Turf Product Solutions Leader in Artificial Turf Maintenance Innovative Battery-Powered Broom and Live Enzyme Cleaner
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Turf Product Solutions introduced the battery-powered Turf Power Sweep, a turf power broom for artificial turf maintenance, and Turf Animal, a live enzyme cleaner with Zap Guard technology for odor elimination and static reduction. The Turf Power Sweep sold out its initial container shipment on Amazon in 30 days, demonstrating high demand. These products address common challenges in artificial turf maintenance for residential, pet, and sports facilities.

articles.title: Magnum ice cream company to use NotCo AI for new products
articles.author: Jessica Di Napoli
articles.summary: Unilever's Magnum ice cream business plans to leverage NotCo's AI to reformulate existing products, create new plant-based options, and manage commodity costs. This initiative aims to address consumer demand for healthier and more sustainable indulgences, including smaller portions and innovative flavors.

articles.title: What did we see at Europe's biggest technology expo?
articles.summary: Major tech brands unveiled new products at IFA Berlin. Among these were stair-climbing cleaning robots, advanced washing machines, and ultra-quiet air purifiers.

articles.title: Netrio Launches Next Release of NetrioNow to Reinvent Managed Services and Redefine the Customer Experience Industry-wide
articles.author: NETRIO
articles.summary: Netrio launched NetrioNow, a next-generation, AI-powered service delivery platform, on September 22, 2025. NetrioNow is designed for the managed service provider (MSP) market and aims to reinvent the managed services model using AI.

articles.title: This rugged Android with a 22,000mAh battery made my iPhone 17 Pro Max look puny
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Doogee's S200 Max offers extreme durability and performance in a single device, though it is not lightweight.

articles.title: This $30 multitool took on way more than I thought it could (and it fits ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: NexTool introduces the S11 Pro, a lightweight and reliable multitool designed for portability.

articles.title: ULTRALOQ Updates Bolt NFC to Support Android Tap-to-Unlock
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: ULTRALOQ, a smart lock brand under Xthings, announced a major update to its Bolt NFC smart lock, bringing seamless NFC tap-to-unlock functionality to most Android smartphone users. The Bolt NFC, priced at $199.99, is available at ultraloq.com, Amazon, and the tm:rw flagship store in New York, with the Android NFC functionality available via a free U home app update.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Shoe Tie Bank for Children (NJR-275)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has created the 'TIE ME SHOE BANK,' a dual-function accessory designed to teach children how to tie shoes and save money. The patent-pending invention increases children's independence and is available for licensing or sale through InventHelp.

articles.title: Nothing Headphones (1) review: First step, clear intent
articles.author: Arghanshu Bose
articles.summary: Nothing has launched its first over-ear headphones, the Nothing Headphones (1), priced at Rs 21,999. Co-developed with KEF, these headphones emphasize design and offer features such as custom-tuned 40mm drivers, LDAC codec support, and a tactile control system. The headphones aim to provide a balanced, clean, and immersive audio experience with customizable sound settings available through the Nothing X app.

articles.title: ULTRALOQ Updates Bolt NFC to Support Android Tap-to-Unlock
articles.author: Xthings Inc.
articles.summary: ULTRALOQ, under Xthings, has updated its Bolt NFC smart lock. The update introduces seamless NFC tap-to-unlock functionality, expanding convenience to most Android smartphone users. This strengthens its position as a platform-inclusive smart lock.

articles.title: ULTRALOQ Updates Bolt NFC to Support Android Tap-to-Unlock
articles.summary: ULTRALOQ, under Xthings, announced a major update to its Bolt NFC smart lock, enabling NFC tap-to-unlock for most Android smartphone users. This update expands key-free entry to both iOS and Android users and is available via a free U home app update. The Bolt NFC smart lock, priced at $199.99, is available at ultraloq.com, Amazon, and the tm:rw flagship store.

articles.title: SanDisk WD_BLACK SN8100 SSD Review: Leading the pack
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Sandisk launched WD_BLACK SN8100, its newest flagship Gen5 SSD. The WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD is available for purchase through all leading IT reseller partners and e-commerce platforms with price starting from Rs 17,499. The new SSDs offer high-speed performance suitable for tasks like 8K editing and gaming.

articles.title: Soup Capital Exchange Upgrades Trading Engine to Process Over 500,000 Orders per Second
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Soup Capital LTD upgraded Soup Capital Exchange with a next-generation trading engine. The enhanced trading engine improves speed, reliability, and user experience.

articles.title: Enterprise Creative AI: Transforming Content Creation with PromptPilot's Advanced Tools and Practical Insights
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: PromptPilot, an Enterprise Creative AI platform, is introduced to help businesses generate high-quality content using AI. The platform provides advanced prompt engineering, integrates with leading AI models, and ensures brand consistency. It allows companies to create photorealistic images and videos of products for marketing materials and e-commerce listings.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Dual Label Pricing Gun (MBQ-749)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor from Brooklyn, N.Y. invented the DUAL PRICE LABEL GUN. This new type of price label gun enables users to easily display dual prices. The design aims to make dual pricing displays clear and simple.

articles.title: Tech Update: How Erthos is tackling plastic waste — at the source
articles.author: Rebecca Gao
articles.summary: Erthos, aiming to reduce plastic waste, has partnered with Colgate-Palmolive to provide access to its proprietary AI platform, ZYA. This platform simulates the performance of sustainable materials and measures key metrics like durability and compostability, enabling Colgate-Palmolive's packaging innovation and sustainability teams to test in-house materials.

articles.title: 46 Boring But Revolutionary Products
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of various innovative products designed to simplify everyday tasks. It features items such as the Medicube's dual-textured toner pads for skincare, JavaSok insulated sleeves for beverages, Color Catcher sheets for laundry, and the Elephant Trax Labels for organizing stored items. Additionally, the article introduces the Dae's 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand for haircare, and a new instant stain and mildew remover.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE deal offers huge freebie giveaway and rivals Apple's iPhone 17 range
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a budget-friendly addition to its Galaxy S25 series. This new smartphone features a 6.7" dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a 12MP ultra-wide camera, and a 50MP wide camera, starting at £649. Sky Mobile offers a launch deal with freebies including a Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 FE for customers choosing a contract.

articles.title: Next winter sweatshirt reduced from £30 to £12 'comfy' and 'oversized'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next has reduced the price of its Cream Slogan 100% Cotton Textured Waffle Sweatshirt from £30 to £12 as part of a sale. The sweatshirt, made from 100% cotton, is available in colors like cream with a 'Gold Coast 42 Australia' slogan and fluro pink. It features a waffle texture, relaxed fit, crew neck collar, and ribbed trims.

articles.title: granderson-how-media-consolidation-silences-free-speech
articles.author: Lz Granderson
articles.summary: Apple launched its latest smartphone, the iPhone 17 Pro Max, featuring advanced telephoto lens, a large display and improved battery life. The new model is expected to address concerns about Apple lagging behind in artificial intelligence, as well as keep up with the competition.

articles.title: Allstate launches North West Digital Hub and Future Innovators Competition in Derry
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Allstate is launching its new North West Digital Hub and the Allstate Future Innovators competition. The competition encourages students to develop digital skills by creating apps and games promoting safe driving habits. The Allstate Foundation supports this initiative with a £30,000 grant.

articles.title: Intrado appoints Blatt as chief product officer
articles.author: Biz West Staff
articles.summary: Intrado will continue to focus on innovations that leverage AI and other cutting-edge technologies to enable safety professionals and organizations to make more informed decisions and improve emergency response outcomes. Intrado will be delivering exceptional emergency-services solutions.

articles.title: Shoppers can order the M&S Christmas food range from this month
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: M&S has announced the launch of its Christmas Food to Order service this month.

articles.title: LookFantastic insiders share dry shampoo that leaves greasy hair 'clean like wash day'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Color Wow launched the Insta-Wow Advanced Dry Shampoo, priced at £26.50. The product incorporates olive leaf extract. Early reviews indicate that the Color Wow Insta-Wow Advanced Dry Shampoo is being received very well with customers expressing satisfaction and comparing it favorably to other dry shampoos on the market. The new product is available for purchase at LookFantastic.

articles.title: Celebrate Festive Glamour with Dyson's Limited-Edition Jasper Plum Airwrap i.d. multi-styler and dryer
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Jasper Plum edition of the Airwrap i.d. multi-styler and dryer, inspired by the purple jasper gemstone. It is priced at ₹49,900 and is available at Dyson Demo Stores and Dyson.in. The new edition comes with additional attachments like a Conical barrel for tighter curls, and a Blade concentrator for precise, aligned styles.

articles.title: Facts That Are Real But Sound Fake
articles.author: Brian Galindo
articles.summary: Netflix planned to release its own streaming device, The Netflix Player, but canceled it to avoid competing with other devices like AppleTV.  Netflix then spun off the product development to Roku, which launched its first streaming device in 2008, initially focusing on streaming Netflix.

articles.title: The Vaping Industry's Retail Revolution
articles.author: John Brown
articles.summary: The vaping industry showcases continuous product innovation and diversification, offering products tailored to varied consumer preferences, including disposable vaping devices and options with different nicotine strengths. Companies utilize direct-to-consumer models, digital marketing, and customer education to build brand awareness and customer loyalty, adapting to regulatory changes and focusing on user experience through strategic design and technological advancements.

articles.title: De'Longhi Dedica Style EC685 review: Quickly turns beginner baristas into pros
articles.author: Emma Henderson
articles.summary: De'Longhi has released the Dedica Style EC685, a compact manual espresso machine. It replaces the Dedica EC680, featuring upgrades like a bigger drip tray and improved steam wand with hot milk and cappuccino options. The EC685 is compatible with ESE pods and is priced under £150.

articles.title: CNH brand New Holland wins two 2025 Agritechnica Innovation Awards
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: New Holland, a CNH brand, received two 2025 Agritechnica Innovation Awards. These awards indicate innovation in New Holland's new products or services.

articles.title: Washing machine with dryer on sale: Top 10 picks to ease your laundry routine at home
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung introduces its 9 kg AI EcoBubble washing machine with features like Wi-Fi controls and hygiene steam. LG presents its AI Direct Drive washer with allergy care and smart wash cycles, along with various washer-dryer models with TurboWash and Steam+ technologies. Bosch highlights its 10.5/6 KG Inverter washer dryer with a rapid wash & dry cycle, while Haier's SmartChoice washer dryer offers PuriSteam and I-Refresh. IFB features its Laundrimagic and Executive ZMN washer dryers with steam refresh and AI-powered cycles.

articles.title: Lenovoâs Luca Rossi on why the companyâs concept devices matter in the age of AI
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Lenovo is experimenting with PC prototypes featuring rollable screens, foldables, dual-displays, and rotatable-screen laptops to explore the future of personal computing. The company is focusing on integrating AI and natural language interfaces to create new form factors and user experiences beyond traditional keyboard-based interactions, suggesting a shift towards more intuitive and creative devices.

articles.title: Ideally Launches in the U.S. and Appoints Former Netflix & Twitter Exec as Fractional Chief Brand & Strategy Officer
articles.summary: Ideally is launching its research platform in the U.S., offering a modern alternative to traditional market research. The platform provides rapid insights and co-creation capabilities, enabling brands to validate assumptions and make consumer-driven decisions. Companies like Google and Burger King have used Ideally to cut research timelines and improve product decisions and promotions.

articles.title: Pakistan's E-Commerce Gets Boost with Goldbox App Launch
articles.author: Urdu Point
articles.summary: Goldbox, a Pakistani e-commerce platform, has launched its mobile application nationwide. The application introduces a novel shopping experience combining surprise elements and instant rewards.

articles.title: eBay to Acquire Tise, Further Strengthening its Consumer-to-Consumer Expertise
articles.summary: Tise's social-driven innovation unlocks access to the next generation of enthusiasts, suggesting a new service or feature designed to engage a younger audience.

articles.title: 9mobile launches portal for NIN verification
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: 9mobile launched a portal allowing its subscribers to submit and verify their National Identification Number (NIN) online. This eliminates the need for customers to visit physical experience centers for NIN verification.

articles.title: The Single Edge Max Razor
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Supply introduces the Single Edge Max Razor, designed for minimal environmental impact and optimal shaving performance. The razor features a small blade design, durable aluminum and zinc construction, and includes eight refill blades and a wall mount. It is engineered for a close shave, blade longevity and ease of recycling.

articles.title: Motorola Kicks off Its Festive Sale on Flipkart Big Billion Days Starting Today 00:00hrs with Unbeatable Offers on Across Its Devices
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola is offering special pricing on its smartphones and ecosystem products during Flipkart's Big Billion Days Sale 2025. Key deals include discounts on the motorola edge 60 PRO, edge 60 FUSION, moto g series (g96 5G, g86 POWER), and razr 60 smartphones, along with deals on moto buds LOOP, moto buds BASS, moto book 60 PRO, moto book 60, moto pad 60 PRO, and moto pad 60 NEO. These offers are available on Flipkart during the Big Billion Days sale period.

articles.title: Maruti Suzuki Victoris Review: Pros & Cons of Creta Rival
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki launched the Victoris, a new SUV. The Victoris features a striking design, a feature-packed cabin, and performs well on city roads and highways. The SUV aims to be a practical and premium ride.

articles.title: I gave ChatGPT $500 of real money to invest in stocks. Its picks surprised me
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: OpenAI launched its new GPT-5 model in August. The company claims GPT-5 is its 'smartest, fastest, most useful model yet'. Interacting with it is described as 'chatting with a helpful friend with PhD‑level intelligence.

articles.title: The heritage of marketing in South Africa
articles.author: Elaine van Wyk
articles.summary: Nando's, founded in Joburg in 1987, has built its brand on irreverent campaigns using humor and cultural references to connect with audiences. South African Breweries (SAB) recently launched a campaign celebrating its 130-year history, illustrating the company's growth alongside South Africa's democratic progress with branded trucks.

articles.title: Newslaundry's AI chatbot is doing more than answering queries
articles.author: Neha Gupta
articles.summary: Newslaundry launched 'Ask Birubala,' an AI chatbot designed to manage subscriber queries and documentation. This AI tool helps in upskilling staff by automating repetitive tasks, allowing the support team to focus on more complex work.  The tool functions as a troubleshooting assistant for subscriber issues, a knowledge assistant for onboarding staff, and a documentation shortcut.

articles.title: Posiflex Unlocks Smarter Business Solutions with AI-Enabled Innovations at GITEX GLOBAL 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Posiflex is launching new AI-enabled solutions at GITEX GLOBAL 2025, including SCO Series AI-Powered Smart Self-Checkout, Tap-to-Pay POS solution, MT-6200 Series mobile checkout, and KDS Series kitchen solutions. These innovations aim to enhance customer experiences and optimize business efficiency in the retail and hospitality industries.

articles.title: ⚡2026 Renault Duster Launch Expected in 2026; Check Details
articles.summary: Renault's new-generation Duster is expected to launch in 2026. Spotted testing in Bengaluru, the 2026 Duster may feature vertically aligned LED taillights, a rectangular headlamp cluster, panoramic sunroof, and a 10-inch infotainment display.

articles.title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Grab up to 50% off on automatic washing machines from LG, Samsung and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new washing machines during the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025. Electrolux is introducing an 8kg/5kg washer dryer, Godrej is offering AI-powered top-load machines, Bosch features AI ActiveWater+ in their 7kg models, LG highlights Smart Inverter and AI Direct Drive technology, Samsung uses EcoBubble technology, and IFB integrates DeepClean® and AI-driven optimizations. These new models offer diverse features and technologies aimed at efficient and effective laundry solutions.

articles.title: Inside OSNtv's bold tech overhaul
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: OSNtv launched several new products and services in 2025, including a next-gen set-top box, a self-service app, addressable advertising capabilities, and AI-powered personalization. OSNtv also introduced Media as a Service (MaaS) offering with Vodafone Qatar and direct integration with Samsung Smart TVs, expanding its reach and enhancing customer experience.

articles.title: Best Smartphones Under Rs 20,000: Why Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Stands Out
articles.summary: The Motorola Edge 60 Fusion features a 1.5K True Color Quad-Curve display, Pantone-validated cameras, and military-grade durability. It is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, has a 5500mAh battery with 68W TurboPower charging, and is priced at ₹19,999 (effective price during Big Billion Days).

articles.title: ドコモ、Googleの「Pixel Watch 4」と「Pixel Buds 2a」を10月9日に発売
org: NTTドコモは、全国のドコモショップおよびドコモオンラインショップで、「
articles.summary: NTT Docomo offers Google Pixel W at Docomo shops and the Docomo online shop.

articles.title: Giant greetings: The 7m Labubu welcomes travelers at HK Airport
articles.author: Phoebe Poon
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch mini Labubu this week. The company anticipates revenue exceeding 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: P&G opens new production line in Romania
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble has started a new production line in Romania for Lenor scented pearls, which are described as a recent innovation in fabric care. This follows the company's inauguration of a factory for Ariel PODs detergent capsules four years prior in the same location.

articles.title: Why marketers must win algorithms over before they woo consumers
articles.author: M. Muneer
articles.summary: Brands are now optimizing their products and marketing for AI algorithms like ChatGPT and Claude, as these algorithms influence consumer choices. Marketers must track sentiment across AI platforms, benchmark against competitors, and take corrective actions to ensure their product is viewed favorably. This is done because AI's perception now precedes reality, influencing consumer awareness and preferences.

articles.title: King Island Dairy owners' ambitious plans to grow milk and cheese supply
articles.summary: King Island Dairy's new owners are targeting younger consumers. The company expands its operations with innovative farming technology.

articles.title: Equator Pure Nature Announces Expansion of Pipper Standard® in Singapore
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Equator Pure Nature has partnered with Prestigio Pte. Ltd. to expand the distribution of Pipper Standard products in Singapore. This collaboration will increase the availability of Pipper Standard's natural home, laundry, and personal care products through both online and offline channels, including major retailers like Fairprice and Amazon Fresh. Prestigio Pte. Ltd. will distribute Pipper Standard® patented products in a major hub of Southeast Asia.

articles.title: The iPhone 17 is pre -order, take advantage of this unexpected price at Auchan
articles.summary: Apple's iPhone 17 is now available for pre-order at Auchan, starting at €969. The new smartphone features an adaptive 120Hz display with Ceramic Shield 2 technology, a dual 48MP fusion camera system, and fast charging capabilities via USB-C. It represents Apple's commitment to innovation and a high-quality user experience.

articles.title: Kindle Colorsoft Review: e-reader adds full book experience
articles.author: Kara Byers
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, its first color e-reader. It features a color e-ink display, waterproof design, and weeks of battery life for reading novels. The Colorsoft is designed for visually rich content like graphic novels, cookbooks, travel guides, and children's books and comes with 16GB or 32GB of storage.

articles.title: Top robot vacuum cleaner deals you can grab now for smarter cleaning in 2025
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: ECOVACS DEEBOT Y1 Pro features LiDAR navigation and 6500Pa suction, while the ILIFE V20 offers SoF laser navigation and 5000Pa suction. DREAME D10 Plus Gen 2 includes automatic dust emptying and 6000Pa suction; DREAME L10s Ultra boasts AI obstacle detection and 5300Pa suction. LEFANT M210P offers 2200Pa suction in a slim design.

articles.title: Air Jordan 5 'White Metallic' is Bringing a New Layer of Class to a Classic Silhouette: Release Date and Where to Buy
articles.author: Brian Mazique
articles.summary: Jordan Brand is set to re-release the Air Jordan 5 OG 'White Metallic' in Summer 2026. The sneaker, featuring a white/metallic silver-black colorway (HQ7978-103), will retail for $215 and be available on SNKRS. This release will feature the original 'Nike Air' branding on the heel.

articles.title: 21 Highly Rated Lovehoney Toys With Memorable Reviews
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various sex toys with different features, including clitoral stimulators, vibrators, dildos, and couples' vibrators. Each product is described with its unique functionalities, such as suction, vibration patterns, and remote control capabilities, along with price points and user reviews to showcase the product's benefits and user satisfaction.

articles.title: Hyundai Motor introduces lower-priced trim for Ioniq 5 N high-performance EV
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Hyundai Motor Co. released a new product.

articles.title: Century Pacific Selects Blue Yonder's AI-Powered Solution To Digitally Transform Its Demand and Supply Planning
articles.summary: Century Pacific Food, Inc. has selected Blue Yonder's Demand and Supply Planning solution to digitally transform its supply chain. This AI-driven solution aims to optimize inventory and improve demand and supply forecasts for the food company. Blue Yonder's Demand and Supply Planning sits on the Blue Yonder Platform, ensuring forecast precision and optimal inventory placement for Century Pacific Food.

articles.title: Young entrepreneurs let dreams take flight amid China's innovation drive
articles.author: 于小明
articles.summary: Glacier Wisdom, a tech startup, has created the "AI Power Box," an AI-powered psychological health product. Dream Lab is also helping a student to produce a smart teacup that can display temperature and automatically select brewing methods based on different types of tea. Beijing Volumetric Capture Technology Co Ltd leverages volumetric technology to convert real human images into holographic virtual images.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Instantly Add $5,000 Of Revenue Every Month
articles.author: Jodie Cook
articles.summary: The article suggests using ChatGPT to identify micro-problems faced by a target audience and create digital products or services priced between $27-$197. Additionally, it recommends leveraging ChatGPT to develop cross-sell email sequences and referral scripts to boost revenue. These strategies aim to help businesses generate more offers that convert today and add recurring revenue.

articles.title: How Startups Are Using AI To Outsmart Established Competitors
articles.author: Sanjay Bhatia
articles.summary: Lemonade has reimagined the insurance industry by processing claims using AI in seconds. Notion reimagined productivity software by building AI directly into its platform, offering AI-powered writing, brainstorming, and organization tools. These startups exemplify how AI is driving the introduction of new products and services, disrupting established industries.

articles.title: A Note from ThredUp CEO James Reinhart (ThredUp Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: ThredUp is celebrating its sixteenth anniversary with an upgrade, introducing fresh features and a new look to improve the secondhand shopping experience.

articles.title: A&W's Plant-Based Burger is the newest addition to the permanent menu (A&W Revenue Royalties Income Fund)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: A&W Canada is introducing a new plant-based burger, the A&W Plant-Based Burger, nationwide. This vegetarian option was developed by A&W's innovation kitchen.

articles.title: Why You Shouldn't Hold Your Breath About This Pokemon Legends: Z-A DLC Rumor
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A announced upcoming downloadable content (DLC) before the release of the base game, building on the model established by Pokemon Sword and Shield.

articles.title: Yeedi's M12 Ultra Plus Robot Vacuum Returns to Record-Low $530 Price
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Yeedi is offering a substantial discount on its flagship vacuum cleaner. This represents a significant price drop, which is not frequently observed.

articles.title: Dyson Airwrap i.d. gets festive makeover with Jasper Plum Edition
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: Dyson has unveiled the Jasper Plum edition of its Airwrap i.d. multi-styler and dryer. This new colorway, inspired by the purple jasper gemstone, is designed for the festive season.

articles.title: I Tried Dreame's New Wet and Dry Vacuum That Reduces Allergies by Spraying Your Carpets ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dreame has introduced a new wet and dry vacuum. This product is equipped with cleaning features. These features, according to the company, can assist in alleviating allergies.
